title: PHQ-9
instructions: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?

q_text.text: Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
Trouble falling/staying asleep, sleeping too much.
Feeling tired or having little energy.
Feeling bad about yourself, or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or your family down.
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching TV.
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite; being so figety or restless that you have been moving around more than usual.
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way.
